column4: Umm, I was wondering, How do I add cool affects and features to Ubuntu
Umm, I was wondering, How do I add cool affects and features to Ubuntu?
Umm, I don't think I have enough ram for Compiz fusion.
I'm not quite sure about video, But I think ram I have around 512?...
I've heard I have a bad video card as well..
I'm not quite sure about video, But I think ram I have around 512?...
the 'free' command will tell you how much ram you have
compiz puts more strain on your video card and processor than it does your RAM, but 512 is more than enough RAM yeah
do you know what kind of video card you have?  or how old is your computer?
what tigran just said will give you the info
that's the same thing I've got :D
works fine for compiz right out of the fox
you should be able to just turn on Compiz, and have everything working
